Went with the friends several times during our stay in New York. Busy at times so make sure you book in advance. The staff is great and the food is amazing.
We went with a group of friends on a Saturday night and it was perfect. Great wine menu, amazing starters and super tasty pizza!
Lovely restaurant in NYC. If you want to taste some Italian food this is the right place to go! Great service and good selection of wines

column3: No way!!! Pizza Domino's is better
